name: Negotiate with 'The Negotiator' Online Trivia | Literature | 10 Questions

questions.text: How many O'Malley siblings are there?
questions.explanation:
seven.

	There are seven and they are Marcus, Jack, Stephen, Rachel, Kate, Jennifer and Lisa.

hostage negotiator.

	Kate is a hostage negotiator. The other occupations on the list are held by various members of her family.

questions.text: How do Dave and Kate meet?
questions.explanation:
in a bank robbery.

	Dave Richman was introduced in the prequel to the O'Malley series. It was a book called 'Danger in the Shadows' and is an exceptional thriller/romance. He and Kate met when he was in a bank robbery and Kate negotiated it.

questions.text: Do Dave and his sister own their own plane?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	His father is a rich man and therefore he and his sister are very well off. Dave used the plane as a way to get his sister Sara out of town quickly.

questions.text: Who did Kate tell Dave is the first O'Malley to be engaged?
questions.explanation:
Jennifer.

	Jennifer is a doctor and is engaged to Tom, who is also a doctor.

questions.text: What secret did Kate learn from Jennifer before anyone else?
questions.explanation:
she has cancer.

	Kate was the first O'Malley Jennifer told she has spinal cancer because she knew Kate was strong and could help her tell the others. Marcus, the oldest brother, was the next to know.

questions.text: Where did Marcus send Kate to stay when she was being threatened?
questions.explanation:
Dave's house.

	Because of Sara's predicament in 'Danger in the Shadows', Dave's house was set up for security so Kate stayed with him.

questions.text: Which team did Kate tell Dave lost in the baseball game he was watching between the Cubs and Milwaukee?
questions.explanation:
Cubs.

	"How do you know?" Dave asked."Because they were playing Milwaukee," Kate said.

questions.text: Who did Dave find out was the favorite of all seven O'Malley's?
questions.explanation:
Jennifer.

	Jennifer told Dave she was the favorite of all the O'Malleys and Dave told her it was because she was the youngest.

questions.text: How was Dave initiated into the O'Malley family?
questions.correct: he played in a baseball game
options: he was dunked in a dunking booth
questions.explanation:
he played in a baseball game.

	It was the famous Fourth of July O'Malley baseball game where Dave asked Kate to be his girl and was also initiated into the O'Malley clan as an unofficial member.
